auxiliary_Stephany module

auxiliary_stephany.get_first_15_most_frequency(df: DataFrame, df_groupy) → DataFrame

Get the rows that contain the first 15 most common description occurrences.

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – The DataFrame containing the column ‘description’.

  • df_groupby (pd.core.series.Series) – A core.series.Series with the sizes of the groups by the parameter ‘description’.

Returns:

A DataFrame containing the rows with the 15 most common description occurrences.

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame

Raises:

KeyError – If the ‘description’ column does not exist in the DataFrame.

auxiliary_stephany.get_hour(df: DataFrame) → DataFrame

Create a new Dataframe column called hour, which contains the hour information extracted from the callDateTime column. The entries in ‘callDataTime’ must be in the format: ‘date hour:minutes:seconds’.

Parameters:

df (pd.DataFrame) – The DataFrame containing the column ‘callDataTime’.

Returns:

A DataFrame containing the new column ‘hour’.

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame

Raises:

KeyError – If the ‘callDateTime’ column does not exist or is in an unexpected format.

auxiliary_stephany.load_datafile(file_path: str) → DataFrame

Read the csv data file indicated by file_path. The file must use a tab separator.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – The path to the csv file containing the data files.

Returns:

A DataFrame containing the ‘callDateTime’, ‘priority’ and ‘description’ columns.

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame

Raises:

  • FileNotFoundError – If the file does not exist.

  • ValueError – If the file does not contain the expected columns.
